author: scottbw
msg: Applied patch supporting dynamic build and deploy of widgets (thanks to Ross Gardler for the patch) and removed the default widgets from the core package and  database creation scripts; these are now added dynamically. (Note that this means default widgets are no longer placed in categories). This fix applies to WOOKIE-51
